summary: Do you have a younger brother or just don't like to see every dead NPC getting naked after you've looted him? This mod is for you.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Author:[/b] PVdL
[b]Permission or requests:[/b] Ask me first
[b]Current version[/b] of this mod is 1.2.1
[b]
[size=4]Description and features:[/size][/b]

Do you have a younger brother or just don't like to see every dead NPC getting naked after you've looted him? This mod is for you.

This Mod allows the player to change Dead NPC Clothing and will grant all of the optional features as below:

1 - Enable player, npc or Mod features configuration  in-game throughout MCM
2 - Dinamic clothing system:
2.1 - Random: Will equip player and NPC random pieces of clothing from nude to full covered randomly
2.2 - Full Clothing: Will equip NPC with Beggar Robes, player will be dressed based on his current wealth
2.3 - Full Undergarments: Will equip player and NPC with undergarments (Female only, Male will be dressed with beggar robes).
2.4 - Minimum Undergarments: Will equip player and NPC with minimum undergarments (Female only, Male will be dressed with beggar robes).

[size=4][b]Requirements:[/b][/size]

SKSE 1.7+ (http://skse.silverlock.org/)
SkyUI 4.1+ (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?)
Lingerie Set for the UNPB BBP Body (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34308/)
    * I've tested this mod with on UNP Blessed Body and 7B
    * This mod has a conversion to 7B!
    * I've never tested on CBBE or other body mods but probably will have some clipping issues
    * If you don't have this mod installed all options that use it won't dress your Player nor NPC, the'll be naked OR it may crash your game


[size=4]Change log:[/size]

1.0: Clothes dead NPC with custom armor or beggar robes if none given.
1.1: Add player support, if player gets naked he'll get robes that fits his/her wealth, NPC, Mod and Player features can be disabled by MCM (Mod Configuration Menu).
1.2: Add player and NPC support to dynamic clothing system, customized by MCM
1.2.1: Fix a bug when female undies would be over a body armor


[size=4]Future plans for 1.3:[/size]
1 - IF I find a decent male underwear and the modder allows me to use it in my mod I'm willing to add Male Undergarments support
2 - Custom undergarments support (Difficult but with a little bit of effort it can be done)

Credits:
SkyUI Team    (Script/UI)
SKSE Team    (Script)
kuzak76        (Clothing)



[size=4]Instalation:[/size]
Automatic: Use NMM to Install/Uninstall and your done.
Manual:
1 - Copy all files to Skyrim\Data folder.
2 - Activate vlkAutoEquip.esp on game manager or Nexus Mod Manager.

[size=4]Update:[/size]
1 - Unistall Mod
2 - Enter Skyrim and make a NEW SAVE GAME
3 - Install Mod
4 - Load save game from step 2
(by now it should be working, but the following steps can help if Skyrim kept a 'cache' of the scripts)
5 - Open Mod configuration Menu and exit
6 - Travel to a different location
7 - Enjoy
author: PVdL

files.name: clothes_for_deceased_1_2
files.changelogHtml:
1.2: Add player and NPC support to dynamic clothing system, customized by MCM
1.1: Add player support, if player gets naked he'll get robes that fits his/her wealth, NPC, Mod and Player features can be disabled by MCM (Mod Configuration Menu).
1.0: Clothes dead NPC with custom armor or beggar robes if none given.
